ygData.subject: Re: Taking the plunge - starting EQ tomo
ygData.msgSnippet: 1) Server: There s a list of servers. So it s easy to tell which one you re on. You can have up to 8 character per server. I have characters on Drinal and
ygData.messageBody:
1) Server: There's a list of servers. So it's
easy to tell which one you're on. You can have up to 8
character per server. I have characters on Drinal and
Veeshan and I can't honestly remember what other servers.
LOL.<br><br>As for PK.. there are PK only servers, as well as
team PK servers that are dependant on your race.
There's also regular servers in which you choose to be PK
or not.<br><br>2) Agility and Dex are pretty much
resolved as the stats of choice for Rogues. They dodge and
attack faster with those two stats as well as backstab
better. <br><br>However, all the stats are good. Even
Charisma to a certain degree. I recommend going to sites
like Everlore.com or <a href=http://eq.stomped.com/ target=new>http://eq.stomped.com/</a><br>Look up
some info.<br><br>3) Up to you. For example, I spend
my skill points on Languages, some trade skills that
are expensive to practice like Jewelry and Pottery,
and skills at later levels for my guild that can be
learned only by spending at least one point first.
Overall... up to you though.<br><br>4) Clans or guilds are
great. A lot of ppl join them and they help you get
items and find people to group with. <br><br>That being
said, I haven't joined one yet myself as I'm looking
for the guild that I think will fit my personality
best. Guilds also should, IMHO be the group that you
have FUN with. People you like.<br><br>5) have fun..
=)<br><br>shooman out<br><br>Fatedhue Prismatic of the Drinal
Server.
